body_html:
@gabrieldemarmiesse: this is not exactly true, as tf.keras.layers and tf.layers occasionally behave differently. For example the default activation function tf.keras.layers.Dense is "relu", but for tf.layers.Dense it is "linear". Caveat emptor!

EDIT: Nevermind, I must have hallucinated this difference...

body:
@gabrieldemarmiesse: this is not exactly true, as tf.keras.layers and tf.layers occasionally behave differently. ~~For example the default activation function tf.keras.layers.Dense is "relu", but for tf.layers.Dense it is "linear"~~. Caveat emptor!

EDIT: Nevermind, I must have hallucinated this difference...
